title: Seduced by Her Stepbrother: The Collection: Billionaire Stepbrother Romance
description: Seduced by her Stepbrother: The Collection*Seduced by her Stepbrother*Melanie Jacobs hasn't seen her billionaire stepbrother Christian in years. After their parents' explosive divorce, she never expected to see him again but to her shock, he suddenly re-enters her life, making demands and rekindling her feelings for him! Will she resist his handsome looks and sensuous ways, or will Melanie be ... Seduced By Her Stepbrother?*Her Stepbrother's Baby*Young, naïve Melanie Jacobs succumbed to a single night of passion with her stepbrother Christian Evans, a gorgeous billionaire. After Melanie rejected his desire to start a relationship, Christian moved on and is now engaged to the world-famous supermodel, Lucia. To Melanie's shock that single passionate night has yielded lasting consequences - she is expecting Christian's baby. She's determined to make the best of her situation, and stay out of Christian's life - but will she be able to keep her secret? Find out in ... Her Stepbrother's Baby.*Claimed by her Stepbrother*One night of passion with her billionaire stepbrother Christian has left Melanie Jacobs in an interesting condition. Christian's supermodel fiancée has generously offered to raise the child as her own - provided Christian never see Melanie again. Can Melanie really give up her baby to her stepbrother and his future bride? Can Christian really give up his alluring stepsister? Find out in ... Claimed by her Stepbrother.*Her Stepbrother's Bride*Stepsiblings Melanie Jacobs and billionaire Christian Evans have agreed to raise their baby together. Melanie struggles to convince herself that she wants nothing more than a simple life and platonic, co-parenting arrangement with her stepbrother. But Christian is madly in love with his beautiful stepsister, and is determined to win her heart. Will Melanie resist Christian's love, or will she find herself becoming ... Her Stepbrother's Bride?
author: Taryn James
